name: Luis Rodriguez
text: Great Value. Stopped by around 7pm. Waited less then 10 mins for a hot and fresh pepperoni and crazy bread. Quality was good. The marinera sauce was missing from the crazy bread.

name: Jonathon Parker
text: Came at 8:25 and waited about 20 minutes for one sausage and pepperoni pizza. No other customers except for one who came in to pick up. Employees were very quiet and didnt respond when i asked two different questions. Have never had any …More

name: online id
text: Good location. I like the pizza portal. I just order through the app. Go get it. No need to talk to anyone. It's easy. You'll love the portal pickup. You walk in. Put your code in and get your pizza and leave.

name: Michael Pierce
text: Stopped in at lunch today. The place was empty of customers at noon on a weekday. That should have been a clue for me. I waited a few minutes before a female with orange, matted hair came out of the back in a manger's shirt. There was food …More

name: Steve Jucker
text: Don't waste your time here. Go to papa John's or dominos for faster friendlier service. Gave this place 3 tries and each time was worst then the last on wait times when lobby and drive thru are empty to the quality of food. I've had the …More

text: Went there around closing time and didn’t realize it. They were nice and made my two pizzas. Two younger teenagers were not dressed in uniform were behind the counter and were cussing a lot. I also heard employees in the back cussing. They …More

text: We called a order in for pickup was told 15 minutes      got there in 12 was told another 10 minutes. Waited outside and finally when nobody came out with my pizza I went inside to inquire as to where my pizza was and they couldn't find it. …More

name: Brittany Pittman
text: Ordered a pepperoni pizza and crazy bread. Was told it would take 6minutes. Perfect. 30 minutes later and I’m still sitting in my car with no pizza or crazy bread. Slowest pizza place ever. Don’t come here if you plan to eat that same day. 😡

name: Texas Tackycal
text: Very good food customer service was great they keep the place pretty clean it’s in your building so no complaints but very happy with the service

name: keith weekley
text: Took over 45 minutes of waiting in the lobby to be given someone else order because I complain that my order was suppose to be ready 30 minutes ago.  Lobby had at least 7 people waiting for over 25 minutes before someone came from the back.

name: Roxie Lambert
text: The pizza portal was malfunctioning, and service was slow due to being short handed.

name: Jeff Ilardi
text: Really friendly service.  And they actually had Crazy Bread hot and ready. This has been an issue of mine with most Little Caesars, is they dont have what you want hot and ready like they advertise. But now two times in a row they have had what I want hot and ready. So five stars!

text:
Really disappointed with this place. The service is rapidly getting worse and worse. The staff do not seem to care about service and quality and are rude.

text: Called again. Said 20mins. 40 mins later one pizza ready wanted anther 10mins still no 2nd pizza. Left after a hour with no pizza

text: We like their pizza but they mess up every order. Verify everything before you drive away.

name: Karen Poasa
text: Jordan was very nice when I drove through and ordered my 2 pizzas. My order number is 59553 I waited I they said 10 minutes but unfortunately now it's been 17 minutes. Very slow and confused process

name: Chris Carmichael
text: Hot-n-ready from 4-8pm means hot and READY, not ready to be put in the oven but ready for pickup! Have waited over 20 minutes for a hot-n-ready pizza the last 3 visits at different times: 5, 6:30 and 7. Not again. I'll go elsewhere.

name: G P
text: Terrible customer service. I went in because drive thru line was very long & didn’t move for 5 mins.  1 person ahead of me whose order they couldn’t find. She had to go back out to her car & get her phone to show order to them. I waited for …More

text: People are always friendly here

name: Judy Laut
text: This place isn’t taking covid precautions seriously. As we pulled up we saw an employee walk outside to deliver a curbside order WITH HIS MASK AROUND HIS NECK. He then walked back inside to the kitchen never pulling up his mask. We drove away and got food somewhere else, won’t be back.

text: Very poor service it takes two seconds to greet someone when you walk in. Walked in 3 times waited 5 minutes before walking out because no one was there to greet. text: Unfortunately, poor customer service for no apparent reasons today. Ordered online. Went to drive thru and no one responded so went in and picked up using the portal. There were 5 people working that I could see. No customers were in the store. No hi or bye. Pizza was ready and made to order but customers do not seem to be priority.

name: Jason Bone
text: Love Little Caesar's Pizza and will be back. The people were nice, but they need help. Either they are under staffed or need more training. Ordered at 6:15 for a 6:45 pick up. Arrived at 6:45 and waited for over 30 mins. Everyone in there was upset for having to wait a long time.
